mapper.insert: insert into t_goods_type_mapping (id, goods_id, type_id, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: SELECT goods_id FROM t_goods_type_mapping WHERE type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, goods_id, type_id, create_date from t_goods_type_mapping
